7F //(0x00)--------ylimit 127
FF //(0x01)-------->xlimit 255
00 //(0x02)-------->x
00 //(0x03)-------->y
00 //(0x04)-------->x+y
00 //(0x05)-------->pixel colour
01 //(0x06)-------->foreground 1
00 //(0x07)-------->background 0
00 //(0x08)-------->reset
00
00
00
00
00
00
00
3F //63 (0x10)
7B //123(0x11)
28 //40(0x12)
50 //80(0x13)
FF //(0x14)
00
00
00
00
00
00
00
00
00
00
00
78 //120(0x20)
A0 //160(0x21)
00
